Content: *p70956a01832*18	   *13	 compare and contrast the reactions in aqueous solution of nickel(ii) sulfate with sodium hydroxide and with ammonia.	for each reaction include•	what would be seen•	the equation (state symbols are not required) •	the type of reaction. (6)

Title: June 2022
Content: *p70956a02132*turn over     21	  	(b)	 tests on samples of q show that it•	burns in air with a very sooty flame•	forms an orange precipitate with brady’s reagent (2,4-dinitrophenylhydrazine solution)•	forms a silver precipitate with tollens’ reagent•	decolourises bromine water•	exists as a pair of geometric isomers.		deduce a structure for q, explaining how each piece of information supports your answer.(6)(total for question 14 = 10 marks)
